title: Oral Health and Sexual Education for Transgender Women: Social Media-Based mHealth Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Sex Education and Oral Health Management Knowledge
context.additional_context: Customized education for transgender women in managerial/leadership roles, designed with cultural sensitivity and digital device utilization in mind.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain at least three oral health management methods for transgender women
Learners will apply strategies for preventing sexually transmitted infections (e.g., condom use) during oral sex with over 80% accuracy
Learners will develop practical plans to improve access to dental services within the community

resources: Expert Consultation with Specialized Dentists and LGBTQ+ Education Specialists

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
